Chronological Inconsistency.text: The patient presented with abdominal pain and hepatic encephalopathy. He was previously admitted for increased hepatic encephalopathy and was discharged with abdominal pain and tremulousness.
Chronological Inconsistency.explanation: The summary incorrectly implies that the patient has been recently discharged with abdominal pain and tremulousness, while the EHR note states the patient had a prior admission for increased hepatic encephalopathy and was discharged. This sequence could confuse the reader regarding the current state of the patient.
